last_episode_to_air.name: Emotions
last_episode_to_air.overview: A concerned Hitomi tracks down a severely broken Shin, who is still unable to recover from the horrific events that sidelined his ability to write.

name: Million Yen Women
overview: Five beautiful but mysterious women move in with unsuccessful novelist Shin, who manages their odd household in exchange for a tidy monthly sum.

episodes.name: The Mysterious Million Yen Women
episodes.overview: A strange and sudden series of offers leads Shin to host five beautiful residents in his home. But he is not allowed to ask questions of them.

episodes.name: Values
episodes.overview: Shin visits his father and one murder victim’s mother. A critical magazine column spoils his mood during dinner, leading to a lesson from Minami.

episodes.name: Exposure
episodes.overview: Shin and his housemates attend an anniversary party, where he spots rival novelist Yuzu Hanaki and learns that Nanaka is more than she seems.

episodes.name: Choices
episodes.overview: After seeing Shin leave Midori's room, Hitomi expresses her displeasure. Midori asks for help with a constant problem dating from her childhood.

episodes.name: Absolute
episodes.overview: Midori faces the aftermath of her decision. The house learns about Yuki's mysterious background. Nanaka displays some brutal honesty at a talk.

episodes.name: Appeal
episodes.overview: Shin releases his new novel and, not at all to his surprise, it does not sell well. But Hitomi plans to use some personal connections to change this.

episodes.name: Affection
episodes.overview: After Shin receives his award, his unique living arrangement (and the truth about his father) is revealed to the public. Nanaka tempts him on a date.

episodes.name: Reason
episodes.overview: With tragedy striking the Michima residence, the police interrogate those inside. Shin gains even more notoriety as his novel becomes a best-seller.

episodes.name: Ready
episodes.overview: Despite a tragic turn of events, Shin is urged to write a new book. The girls invite him to dinner while Minami reveals her dark past.

episodes.name: Disbanded
episodes.overview: Shin and the remaining girls are left homeless due to arson. He accepts a live TV interview with Hanaki to lure out the mastermind on his own terms.

episodes.name: Confrontation
episodes.overview: Shin receives a visit from the architect of the heinous plot. As he struggles to write his next novel, those left behind contemplate their future.

episodes.name: Emotions
episodes.overview: A concerned Hitomi tracks down a severely broken Shin, who is still unable to recover from the horrific events that sidelined his ability to write.
